Desc.entry: A worldwide Christian movement and registered charity committed to meeting the needs of people regardless of their race, age, gender or faith. Focus on personal and social development with children and young people, and international work. Provides a children's nursery for children aged 3 months to 5 years and also provides emotional well being support for children and young people aged 5 year to 25 years. Runs a counselling service for young people aged 13-25 years (see separate entry).

ContactName.entry: Neville Chambers, Accountant and Company Secretary
